channel.title: Ballscape [317] Lots of Content | Combining oldschool and newschool
channel.description:
Hello,
I would like to show you: Ballscape
Ballscape is a 317 rsps with a lot of Skilling, PvM and PvP Content. We have a fully working NEX (with phases and minions) along with oldschool graphics. We feature Classic bosses like the chaos elemental, and custom bosses just like the King of the Caves. We have custom Quests and are always working on new quest series. We offer the best skilling scripts to improve your Game Experience. We have Glacors, Living Rock Caverns, Strykewyrms, the latest items and much more.
Ballscape also offers weekly updates in form of custom Quests, new Minigames and Npc or Skilling areas, as well as a very stable economy granted by our custom Npc drop system
[b]Features:[/b]
[b]Monsters:[/b]
-Nex -All Godwars Bosses -Revs -Glacors -Frost Dragons -Strykewyrms -King of Caves -Crazy Psych0 Bitch
[b]Quests:[/b]
-A Simple Mans Dream -Dragon Slayer -Mej-Jal in Need -Many more comming soon!
[b]Content:[/b]
-Living Rock Caverns -Great Farming (watch herbs grow) -Pets (help you out in combat, too!) -Stable Economy -Many Npc and Training Areas -Many Minigames -Battlegrounds (Dominion Tower)
[b]Skills:[/b]
-All 317 Skills are working -get rich by Skilling with our stable Eco -Decent Xp rates, not too fast and not too slow
[b]Community:[/b]
-active and friendly staff -friendly community -forums comming soon (using facebook group atm) -Ballscape Guide & Help site comming soon, too
but enough talking, here're some pictures:
Many active Players: [img]http://666kb.com/i/ce0glh1tdcedlgred.jpg[/img]
Custom Interfaces! [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdq58nhbzxbn7uvbh.jpg[/img]
Nex with her Minions: [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdpalw3dmrlwhdrhk.jpg[/img]
Glacors: [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdpan4xkulk476fzc.jpg[/img]
Living Rock caverns: [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdpamr107vtgjpox4.jpg[/img]
Starter set: [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdqfowe2bid68tb0t.jpg[/img]
Skilling? check out our donator zone. [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdpareezywju7pmjs.jpg[/img]
Frost dragons in the Wilderness [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdpanncpd1dcqgsbs.jpg[/img]
Battlegrounds (aka Dominion Tower) [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdq55q7ttugzwqozx.jpg[/img]
SO MANY ITEMS, MUCH MORE THAN SHOWN HERE! [img]http://666kb.com/i/cdq8zbhbmftdx66tp.jpg[/img]
We can't show you everything here, but why don't you check it out yourself at:
webclient: [url=http://ballscapetr.com/play]http://ballscapetr.com/play[/url]
you can get a download client from there, too.
We hope you enjoy your stay :) - the Ballscape Staff Team

item.title: Ballscape [317] Lots of Content | Combining oldschool and newschool
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Lol no Max you’re wrong… don’t try to brush me off so quickly so that you’re server doesn’t look bad lol.

This server is completely unprofessional… and it’s a shit Delta anyways…So to all the new potential players… you might wanna read this before you play

Read full topic
item.source: Ballscape [317] Lots of Content | Combining oldschool and newschool

item.title: Ballscape [317] Lots of Content | Combining oldschool and newschool
item.dc:creator: @DeltaMax DeltaMax
item.description:
@DeltaMax wrote:

[quote=“Togasa, post:24, topic:518372”]Lol I highly advise anyone reading this advertisement to simply not play this server…
I mean, unless you want a server where the owner does whatever he wants and punishes anyone he wants without reason or restraint… then this is the server for you.

Max I hope this server…wait stop… I KNOW this server will fail…don’t get mad…it’s fate…think about it… Your hosting a piece of shit Delta server that is crammed more and more shit…so goodluck to this…

All I can say is that I’m glad I could get away as soon as I did.

Don’t waste your times guys you could train and train and train and then without a seconds notice you could be abused by the owner Max lol… so you choose… this is just a warning.
Heed it or not…I don’t care. :)[/quote]

i guess you’re the guy i banned for autoclicking before i added my random events
feel free to post any feedback i advise to check the server out yourself and not get blinded by raging autoers

Read full topic

I mean, unless you want a server where the owner does whatever he wants and punishes anyone he wants without reason or restraint… then this is the server for you.

Max I hope this server…wait stop… I KNOW this server will fail…don’t get mad…it’s fate…think about it… Your hosting a piece of shit Delta server that is crammed more and more shit…so goodluck to this…

All I can say is that I’m glad I could get away as soon as I did.

Don’t waste your times guys you could train and train and train and then without a seconds notice you could be abused by the owner Max lol… so you choose… this is just a warning.
Heed it or not…I don’t care.

item.title: Ballscape [317] Lots of Content | Combining oldschool and newschool
item.dc:creator: @DeltaMax DeltaMax
item.description:
@DeltaMax wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:19, topic:518372”][quote author=DeltaMax link=topic=636637.msg4292923#msg4292923 date=1367653423]

What in the Hell is this page for? http://ballscapetr.com/

And I doubt you’re the original owner of the name, or the server so what’s the reason for using the name? It’s been a VERY long time since I’ve been on the server.

It’s the current page where you select if you want to play on the dload client or webclient…?
I know Ballscape isn’t new, the server was online many times. The server’s still loading some old character files.

  • Added screen of the starter set

I think he meant why is that your main site page… Because it’s very basic, bland, empty, and includes nothing about what your server is about.

i’m redirecting this page later today, because i still had to work othem.
the blank site was just temporarily
[/quote]
It only takes a couple of hours to make a good home page if you know what you’re doing.[/quote]
well i have no experience in php and only very basic skills in html, that’s why i have ppl to help me out
the only language i can code well’s java, and i don’t think a java applet’d be a good idea for a homepage

Read full topic
